div.p: Fantastic! Continue with the next question.
Read the questions carefully, select the appropriate answer and justify your response.
(TO BE COMPLETED: Write the question for the student. The correct answer should be FALSE)
Please, mark the most correct answer.
Once finished the activity select true:
The correct answer was FALSE. (TO BE COMPLETED: You can add an explanation of the correct answer)
Congratulations! You have finished the questionnaire. (TO BE COMPLETED: Add some links or document for review the contents of the topics treated in the activity).
The teacher has decided to make you jump this question.
